cyclone.name: ZETA
cyclone.current_location: about 305 mi SSE of the western tip of Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: Forecast to turn northwest, cross the northern Yucatan late Monday, then accelerate toward the north-central Gulf Coast (Louisiana–Mississippi) by Wednesday

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch from Tulum to Rio Lagartos, including Cozumel (Mexico)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning for Pinar del Rio, Cuba
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Western Cuba, northern Yucatan Peninsula, and the north-central Gulf Coast from Louisiana eastward to Alabama/Mississippi
weather_observation.wind: Brief breezy conditions mid-week possible, but tropical-storm-force winds unlikely (≤7% chance)
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the upper Texas coast
weather_observation.rainfall: Occasional outer-band showers possible mid-week; heavy rainfall not expected
